name: Matteo Sam Speaking Chatbot Apple IIE by Toolkitman
name_original: Matteo Sam Speaking Chatbot Apple IIE by Toolkitman
description:
MATTEO SAM SPEAKING CHATBOT APPLE IIE 

This is my chatbot for apple ii computers and emulaotrs witth SAM enabled in port 5, it speeck for real with the help of my facebook friend Allen Green that have added to my chatbot the SAM SAY IT and instructed me how to reporgram TINA CHATBOT to make it speech.

It was a long and with a lot of patience work to rewrite all the code add SAY Command and adjust the variables and code numbers but i like the final speaking chatbot.

CODE EXPLAINED

In first the code recall the say it from sam program and image then start the random i have built for this chatbot that in the real Apple ii is working perfectly but in the emulator like applewin it start everytime from the same sentence strange but true idont know if this is a bug of the applewinrandom and also linapple emulators but see my chatbot works fine in a real Apple ii hardware.

After this there are all the sentences with with say command and after that the if statments sentences to answer to YES or NO from the human writing.
